name: Podcast Post Production Partner Support
features: Removal of unwanted “ums”, pauses, etc
Audio matching to industry standards for quality listening (inclusive of standard processes  REMOVAL OF LOUD PLOSIVES, ROOM REVERB REDUCTION, NOISE REDUCTION, MASTERING FOR LOUDNESS )
Full ID3 Tagging
Distribution of podcast episode to your podcast host
Commercial/sponsor messages at specific timestamps
Add your intros and outros
Add your music

Instagram design thread (Connect to know more)

Audio matching to industry standards for quality listening
Uploading on youtube or any other website
Youtube management
